property.name: text
property.value: Datasets: default: priority, identity, class, variance current: stepsRemoved parent: parentPortIdentity, port: gmPriority, gmIdentity, gmClass, gmVariance

property.name: text
text
property.value: The announceInterval for this clock is modified by the AIPeriodDEviation parameter to reflect differences in oscillator frequency between clocks.

property.name: text
property.value: State codes: 0 Listening L; 1 Master M; 2 Slave S; 3 Passive P BMC parameters: priority (priority1), class (clockClass), variance (stand-in for accuracy, variance, prioiry2), identity.

property.name: text
property.value: This actor accepts a DE token and iff ON is true: 1-generates a timestamp and microstep on receipt, 2-displays the timestamp, microstep and token

entity.name: RandomInteger
entity.doc: Create a sequence of integers that are uniformly sampled from the range 32-bit integers

entity.name: RandomInteger
entity.doc: Create a sequence of integers that are uniformly sampled from the range 32-bit integers

entity.name: RandomInteger
entity.doc: Create a sequence of integers that are uniformly sampled from the range 32-bit integers

property.name: text
property.value:
Announce messafe format: {0:sequenceNum, 1:sourceIdentity, 2:sourcePort, 3:gmPriority, 4:gmClass, 5:gmVariance, 6:gmIdentity}, 7:stepsRemoved, 8:receivingIdentity, 9:receivingPort, 10:extra0, 11:extra1}
The extra fields are defined as follows: -on-the-wire: N/A -computing ERBEST: 10:extra0 = slotNumber, 11:extra1 = code (0=better, 1=better by topology, 2=error) -state computation: 10:extra0 = decision code, 11:extra1 = state

property.name: text
property.value: This actor publishes at t=0 the values of all global parameters. Each 1588 clock subscribes to this publication and uses the received values to initialize local copies of these parameters.

property.name: text
property.value: useStepsRemoved and useFixedN are mutually exclusive
